tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Tooth Coloured Fillings,Teeth Whitening,Dental Cleaning,Dental Checkup (General),Scaling / Polishing,
review:
This was my first visit with Dr. Charmi Mehta and I wanted to get my enamel polishing and scaling done as I have to get the same done really often , also have my broken teeth reshaped and fixed because that teeth would stain really badly and I would feel really uncomfortable to smile as they where stained and not in proper shape.*** **** *** **** *** ****** ** *** **** ******** ****** ******* * **** **** **** ******* 
 
I have always been trying out new dentist to get my front 02 teeth fixed and I have changed 04 doctors as I didn’t see a significant change or difference in my teeth.

However after visiting Dento Kraft I am the happiest. 
And I must say I would continue going to get all my dental work from Dento Kraft and I would definitely recommend my fly and folks to get their dental work done from there.

Dr Charmi Mehta is really so hardworking, so good at her work.
Her work reflects in her results.
She is very particular and very good at her work. There is a lot of perfection in her work. It truly shows that she works with the intention of aiming for perfection and patient satisfaction.
Dento Kraft doctors are the best and really very hardworking, practical and honest.

Really affordable place to go with really good and experienced doctors. ****** ************* *** trustworthy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Fillings,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
My mom was facing issues in multiple teeth as there was gaping and was undergoing severe pain for past 4 months. So I did took her to multiple dentist but pain was recurring and was in search for a dentist who can cure the issue on a permanent basis. During my first appointment, I spoke to Dr. Charmi and she diagnosed the issue at a root level and explained the same in layman term and I got the confidence that she is the one who can cure it permanently. Root canal on multiple teeth and caping was done. The teeth looks all natural and now my mom is quite relaxed and happy with the treatment.
Thank You Dr. Charmi and team for providing the ******* treatment I could ask for and curing the issue at root level. Amazing and completely satisfied!!

tags: None
review: had this problem of cap which use to come out again and again..went to few dentist but everyone suggested me expensive cap options.my neighbour had suggested dr.charmi ...she advised me to go for laser crown lengthening procedure.she explained me well about the procedure.it was basically a bloodless painless procedure when done with laser which basically increses  height odf the tooth and give good shape to gums giving cap adequate height n more natural look becauise of good shape of gums..trust me guys i m eating everything from this side which i previously use get scared in the fear   that my cap would come out and all that embarrasement.really big thanx to dr.charmi

tags: None
review: My uncle had dentures. He had made some 5-6 pairs in past 7 years..he was never satisfied.. Thankfully we came n met dr.charmi.. She was so soft spoken n nice.she asked us for cbct.she explained everything. She called her team on discussion with implantologist and all..fit and adjusted to our budgets..Finally v decided to go for implant fixed dentutes..treatment took say about 4-5 months..but my uncle is so happy.. He cant stop smiling n hogging on food.he regrets not getting it done earlier. She n her implantologist with entire team is just too good.thanx dr.charmi for every bit

tags: None
review: I had this brown and yellow stains on my teeth... And was v conscious to smile.i had been to few dentists before and they had performed whitening but there was hardly any result.but then i consulted dr mehta as my neighbor recommended me.she advised me tooth laminates rather than chemical whitenings which wernt showing any results.i had tried many treatment options n doctors all suggesting the same.but dr.charmi had this absolutely new option n i wanted to opt for it...and yes it was the best decision. I have a perfect smile and natural looking smile more importantly.and i m smiling confidently past a year while people asking as what have i done to get such a makeover....and i have only one answer...see dr.mehta.thanks a ton doc.

tags: None
review: had all blunt teeth.all uneven..v bad,yellow pale teeth...dr.charmi has really worked v hard for almost two months...but what shes given after two months is above anything....what a makeover....i dont look same anymore..have become as fashion icon in my group...everyone are wanting to come to her...shesput  beautiful laminates in all my front teeth...little gum designing...to give that perfect shape to mu teeth n gums n enhancing my smile...she did laser gum depigmentation...my gums were v dark,literally blavk...she made them pinkl...n a tooth diamond on one of the tooth.u have no idea what my face has turned to...god bless her

review: wanted fixed dentures..here proper treatment planning was done and explained to me..all necessary measures where taken since bm mildly diabetic.in all 12 implants were put and got fixed teeth over it..my teeth look beautiful n i look much young..feels confident to roam around and socialise.m really happy .procedure was long but results are extremely good

review: had severe pain in my right upper wisdom tooth..was not able to open mouth as well..she advised removal..she fixed up the appointment with oral surgeon..i was scared bit dr charmi had full confidence n assured me there will no pain n discomfort.looking at her confidence ,i trustrd her n it was actually not bad at all what i had heard and thought about previous night.so thanx dr charmi,also want to convey thanx to the surgeon..he was excellent too.

review: Good a implant surgery done followed by a cap at dr mehtas clinic.the treatment was performed only after all xrays n blood reports n cbct.then everything was explained well to us. I went for surgery.its was very comfortable painless procedure.after capping its fine and i can chew well

tags: None
review:
Hi.had alwez dis food sticking to my teeth
Alwez playing with tongue to clean it..not realizing i m with friends. I finally came to dentist dr.charmi.. She was recommended by a friend of mine. She took a 1 hour to fix it.when i was done i just cud see all black had gone from my teeth n my teeth look as all cavity free.thanx doc

tags: None
review: Had swollen gums.. My teeth looked v small.brushing caused bleeding sometimes.. Many dentist generally advised cleaning. Use to give temporary relief..dr.charmi diagnosed it correctly and advised gum surgerry.did deep cleaning n reshaping of gums..n post few weeks my teeth looked larger, all gums had settled.no swelling no bleeding. I got a permanent solution to my problem.i recommend dr.Mehta's for any dental issues

tags: None
review: I wanted a whitening treatment to be done.Dr.charmi gave me two options. Regular whitening n laser whitening.she made me understand the procedure v nicely and answered all my doubts v patiently.i opted for laser one..n seriously great ever results.m v v happy with it..thanks a ton doc

tags: None
review: M 35 years.my teeth had become mobile in lower front region. There was bleeding also while brushing..been to couple of dentist..all had advised removal of mobile teeth and caps.. But was not keen on removing my teeth..dr.charmi advised an opg and advised to go for gum treatment and splinting.. Thanx to her i din hv to remove the teeth..mobility is stopped n m very happy.totally recommend to go for dr charmi for her v conservative treatment plan.

review: I have undergone root canal surgery for 2 teeth. The treatment really went well. Dr. Charmi & team are well experienced & share every single information related to the treatment. Really a honest feedback from my side.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Hi, I went smile and shine dental clinic because due to wisdom tooth I have pain. There Dr. Kunal Mehta and Dr. Charmi Mehta started the treatment. They extracted the  wisdom tooth and also remove the cavities and fill  the 4-5 tooth. For this I visited 5-6 times their clinic.

My experience is very good regarding facilities, treatment and behaviour of the doctors.

I am strongly recommending Smile N Shine dental clinic and Dr. Mehta for the any dental related problem.
